name: R (Reduce, Reuse, Recycle) NISARG FOUNDATION

address: Senses Eye & ENT Hospital, 2nd Floor, Beauty Arcade, Opposite Pratap Talkies

briefDescription: “ R ” in RNisarg stands for Rethink, Refuse, Reduce, Recycle and when spoken emphasis on the planet being “ OUR ” We aim to create & share simple, sustainable solutions for a healthy planet for all living beings by working on the principle of self-awareness, self-discipline and self-participation. We are currently working in a city called Thane with a population of 20 lakhs. We are a small team who is equipped to develop sustainable solutions for our city, which are sustainable and scalable.  However our limited manpower challenges us to scale. We believe that as an UNSDSN partner, we can interact and ideate with best minds across the world, which will help us nurture and shape our ideas to create the much needed change that the world needs
